project.description:
Make sure to add and implement: - abstract class - interface - subclass
A Pokemon themed weather application that works in tandem with the game pokemon go. Besides providing that same features of weather applications which include telling the temperature of the day and what to expect in the upcoming days, this applicaiton will include what kind of pokemon one should be able to expect during said types of weather. Also a pokedex of chosen pokemon would be provided to give the user a more authentic experience with the game as well as a system where one can put see and manage and inventory of said pokemon.
project.name: WeatherMon
